articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
#30daysoftext Day 1
Let's start easy 🐣
Write about a programming concept you learned recently. 🧠
It can be a short article, a Twitter thread, or even just a tweet. Just ensure to explain it well.
Reply with a link to the text, so we can find it 🤫

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT ropats16 (🧱, 🚀) ᵍᵐ
Imagine hackathons where you can use the full duration working on your ideas unique features instead of spending half the time setting up a foundation 💻
StarterKit can help you do that on @ArweaveEco and here’s a video guide to show you how 👇

Community Labs | we're hiring!: Accelerate your @ArweaveEco project development with StarterKit! 🚀
Dive into this hands-on video tutorial where you'll build a forum and master the StarterKit 📹
Unleash your creativity and bring your unique ideas to life with StarterKit ⚡
https://www.communitylabs.com/blog/building-a-forum-with-starterkit?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=Tweet&utm_campaign=Building+a+Forum+with+StarterKit&utm_id=Building+a+Forum+with+StarterKit
